mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pg1.tn_survey_mt( survey_mt_id, survey_categryid, survey_tmplt_id, survey_mt_nm, reg_dt, mod_dt, published_dt, expired_dt ) VALUES( nextval('seq_survey_mt'), nvl(#{surveyCategryId},0), nvl(#{surveyTmpltId},0), #{surveyMtNm}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{publishedDt}, #{expiredDt} );
